name: Ayanava Dutta
title: AI • Data Engineering • ML Systems

experience.title: Associate 2 – Data and Analytics
bullets: Led technical implementation for a 12-person squad to automate data cleaning workflows; reduced processing time and optimized ETL costs via Azure improvements.
Built a Pandas-based Python package to standardize transformations across diverse formats, improving code reuse and consistency.
Worked on high-volume ETL pipelines for SAP ECC → S/4HANA migration, processing large daily volumes with zero downtime.
Engineered PL/SQL procedures to validate data integrity across complex tables and legacy systems, improving accuracy and trust.
Improved maintainability of a legacy codebase via CI/CD practices and refactoring, boosting developer productivity.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
bullets: Developed and deployed Remittance Prediction models into production, improving accuracy and automating manual work.
Ran monthly performance analysis for remittance prediction and mismatch models to identify bottlenecks and drift.
Built monitoring and retraining pipelines to sustain model performance over time.
Led a 4-member team to architect a Dockerized web application, reducing deployment time and operational friction.
Shipped an intelligent Image Gallery feature that removed most manual review effort across multiple cross-functional teams.
Built a full-stack B2B cloud application with a Dialogflow chatbot handling high volumes of daily queries.

projectsFromResume: ML Model Analyser (Python, Streamlit, LLM) — drift detection, health scoring, auto-generated fixes.
Exam Seating & Attendance Generator (Python, Streamlit, Docker) — clash detection, room allocation, dynamic attendance sheets.
